channel.title: Safezone coords?
channel.description: ok im trying to make a safe zone but i wanna change the coords so the safe zone is in a different area? but i dont get the coords bit? [code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| [/code] i have this atm so how would i change it so the whole island of miscellania is a safezone? any help please
